description: Dara Calleary had been in post for a month after Barry Cowen was sacked over a drink-driving scandal.
title: Irish Agriculture Minister Dara Calleary resigns for attending golf dinner
title_page: Irish Agriculture Minister Dara Calleary resigns for attending golf dinner - BBC News
maintext: Mr Justice Woulfe, a former attorney general in the Republic of Ireland, said he attended one day of the Oireachtas Golf Society outing as a guest, but that he was "not aware in advance that there was going to be an organised dinner as part of the event".
